overview: When Andrés knows the diagnosis of Norma's terminal illness, his mother urges him the need to hold on to his camera, record his family environment and rescue childhood memories that show fragments of a young, cheerful, uninhibited and vital mother. After Norma is a catharsis against family history that reflects on the relationship with our parents and is a metaphor for change and absence. A movie about a family that could be yours.
title: After Norma
